thread.section_title: The High Line Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: wonderful experience
thread.title_full: wonderful experience - Review of The High Line Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: carolespa2005
title: wonderful experience
text:
Hotel is lovely, a hidden gem. Great location to High Line, New Whitney Art Museum, Chelsea Market. Great restaurants within walking distance. A nice safe area to explore on foot. Staff were lovely, remembered my name. Intelligentsia Coffee bar had great pastry and excellent coffee. Staff were knowledgeable and friendly. I was able to purchase whole bean coffee to go. Bartender made great crafted cocktails. My room was spacious and clean. Nice large windows and view of courtyard. highly recommend this former seminary, for a stay. it is a cloistered haven.
Room Tip: view of courtyard is lovely See more room tips
